entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023
